mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_blog( title , content , preview , state , remark , abs , pv , create_id , gmt_create , gmt_modified ) VALUES( #{title} , #{content} , #{preview} , #{state} , #{remark} , #{abs} , #{pv} , #{createId} , NOW() , NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id , title , content , preview , state , remark , abs, pv , create_id , gmt_create , gmt_modified FROM blog_blog WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id , title , state , remark , pv FROM blog_blog
and title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{titleLike},'%') and state = #{state} and remark LIKE CONCAT('%',#{remarkLike},'%')
ORDER BY id DESC
